content: Thankfully, Verdant Glow is so large that it is rather slow. This gives you plenty of time to land some hits while it's getting ready to launch another attack of its own.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Verdant_Glow_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Verdant Glow Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Glow Fight'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully, Verdant Glow is so large that it is rather slow. This gives you plenty of time to land some hits while it's getting ready to launch another attack of its own.
